dcterms:creator: A. Krithara
A. Nentidis
K. Bougiatiotis
G. Paliouras
dcterms:description: The BioASQ-QA dataset is a comprehensive resource designed to meet the authentic information needs of biomedical professionals. It comprises questions in English, accompanied by gold-enriched answers by biomedical experts and relevant supporting material. This dataset stands out due to its realistic and challenging nature, reflecting the complexity of real-world biomedical inquiries, and provides ideal answers in the form of summaries rather than only exact answers.
dcterms:title: BioASQ-QA

dcterms:creator: A. Krithara
A. Nentidis
K. Bougiatiotis
G. Paliouras
dcterms:description: The BioASQ 2023 Task 11b test set consists of question-answer pairs along with their corresponding retrieved documents, designed for evaluating biomedical question answering systems.
dcterms:title: BioASQ 2023 Task 11b test set
